title: Uncalled for Chat Restrictions/Punishments?
body:
Dear Riot, 

I've been banned sometime near the end of last year for verbal abusive behaviour, and since then I have been mindful about behaviour. Just to create a nice and friendly atmosphere for the other players in game. 

Earlier toady, I am sitting on my last Milestone before level 1 Honour level, but after one game where I try to justify to my teammate that I am not a troll. I was then put back to Dishonourable with my rewards rights revoked and was penalised with a Chat Restriction. I would like to get some insights on how I can appeal to this, because I personally don't think I was being abusive or toxic to any other players. In the end I am the one getting penalised while the other person walks freely ruining games for other fellow players.

(P.s. I have tried getting a ticket but it says I have to log in despite being logged in)  
(P.p.s. Is playing Lux Support = Trolling? I feel judge upon and constantly fed negativity just because I play a champion I am comfortable with, if he told me not too before the game started I would've not play Lux, but the fact that nothing was mentioned and he was so toxic throughout the game)

Sincerely,
XyZGeneration.

replies.body:
The login for the support page and the website (boards) are seperate. 
https://i.imgur.com/IrSBuzi.png?noredirect

There are currently issues with the login transition preventing players from easily logging into support. There are two current workarounds:

1. Open the support page in an incognito/private window and follow the process as normal, pressing the login button when prompted.

2. Log out of the website **from the support page**, and then follow the process as normal, pressing login when prompted.

If your support page has the blank "OC" login in the top right, you're good to go. If it only has your summoner icon with "OCEANIA" it means the support page is seeing you as logged in on the website and not in support. You need to follow one of the steps above.
